show_sea_ep: Star Trek: Deep Space Nine - Season 7 - 1
synopsis: Having returned to Earth a couple of months ago, Sisko waits for the Prophets to instruct him on what to do next. When he receives one, he begins searching for the woman behind the face in the sand in his vision. Meanwhile, back on DS9, Kira deals with a promotion and handling the decisions surrounding her command, and finding herself wishing for the return of Sisko. And Worf deals with the loss of his wife, Jadzia Dax.

show_sea_ep: Star Trek: Deep Space Nine - Season 7 - 2
synopsis: Ezri Dax joins Sisko and his family on his quest for the Orb of the Emissary. Colonel Kira mounts a blockade around a Bajoran moon, where the Romulan hospital is - along with thousands of Romulan missles (claimed to be defensive in purpose). Quark joins Bashir & O'Brien as they join Worf, aboard a Klingon warship as they mount a dangerous mission in Jadzia Dax's name in an effort to get her spirit into Sto-vo-kor, the Klingon's heaven.

show_sea_ep: Star Trek: Deep Space Nine - Season 7 - 3
synopsis: Sisko tries to convince Ezri to stay in Starfleet and serve aboard DS9, as Ezri tries to get to know Jadzia's friends aboard the station, especially Worf. Meanwhile, Garak tries to deal with a severe bout of claustrophobia.

show_sea_ep: Star Trek: Deep Space Nine - Season 7 - 4
ep_title: Take Me Out to the Holosuite
synopsis: A Vulcan captain challenges Sisko to a game of baseball.

show_sea_ep: Star Trek: Deep Space Nine - Season 7 - 5
synopsis: Dr. Bashir attempts to bring one of his genetically engineered friends out of the catatonic state she is in, and when he is successful, he begins to fall for her.

show_sea_ep: Star Trek: Deep Space Nine - Season 7 - 6
ep_title: Treachery, Faith and the Great River
synopsis: A Vorta offers Odo valuable information on the Dominion in exchange for asylum. Meanwhile, Nog tries his Ferengi knowledge as he wheels and deals for a valuable piece of equipment for Chief O'Brien.

show_sea_ep: Star Trek: Deep Space Nine - Season 7 - 7
synopsis: An aged Kor requests an opportunity to die with honor as a warrior.

show_sea_ep: Star Trek: Deep Space Nine - Season 7 - 8
synopsis: Capt. Sisko and his away team volunteer to stay with a besieged unit at an isolated outpost.

show_sea_ep: Star Trek: Deep Space Nine - Season 7 - 9
synopsis: Kira is kidnapped and taken to Empok Nor by a member of a Pah'Wraith cult and discovers the group leader is Gul Dukat.

show_sea_ep: Star Trek: Deep Space Nine - Season 7 - 10
synopsis: Severely depressed at his serious war wound, Nog retreats into Vic Fontaine's holosuite program while the singer tries to help him.

show_sea_ep: Star Trek: Deep Space Nine - Season 7 - 11
synopsis: Ezri travels to her family home in search of Chief O'Brien who has discovered a murdered woman connected with the family and the Orion Syndicate.

show_sea_ep: Star Trek: Deep Space Nine - Season 7 - 12
synopsis: Quark and Rom have to rescue Grand Nagus Zek who's being held captive in the alternate universe.

show_sea_ep: Star Trek: Deep Space Nine - Season 7 - 13
synopsis: To find an apparently untraceable murderer, Ezri Dax reluctantly calls up the residual consciousness remnant of her symbiont's past hidden psychopathic murderer host, Joran.

show_sea_ep: Star Trek: Deep Space Nine - Season 7 - 14
synopsis: After searching out and finding Odo, another changeling asks him to leave DS9 with him, even though the rest of the crew aren't convinced the new changeling is not part of the Founders.

show_sea_ep: Star Trek: Deep Space Nine - Season 7 - 15
synopsis: When a programming glitch won't go away, mobsters take over Vic's and open for business, but the DS9 gang takes it personal when their favorite hangout is no longer their favorite, and they plan to get the new management ousted.

show_sea_ep: Star Trek: Deep Space Nine - Season 7 - 16
synopsis: While making plans to attend a medical conference on the Romulan home world, Dr. Bashir is contacted by Sloane of Section 31 and recruited to determine the health of a high-ranking Romulan official. Things turn more desperate, though, when the ranking Starfleet admiral traveling with him, who knows about Section 31's interest in the conference mysteriously suffers a brain aneurysm after Dr. Bashir finds out that Sloane is traveling with the group, as well.

show_sea_ep: Star Trek: Deep Space Nine - Season 7 - 17
synopsis: When the ship Worf was serving on is attacked in battle and all search efforts are abandoned, Ezri takes a runabout in search of him against Sisko's orders. Meanwhile, Sisko proposes to Kassidy Yates.

show_sea_ep: Star Trek: Deep Space Nine - Season 7 - 18
synopsis: The Prophets have told Sisko they do not approve of his impending marriage. Having been captured by the Breen, Ezri and Worf still don't know why the Breen would even bother to capture them. Some Cardassians are beginning to think their alliance with the Dominion was a grave mistake. Gul Dukat, disguised as a Bajoran, sets foot on DS9, and continues to unfurl his plan.

show_sea_ep: Star Trek: Deep Space Nine - Season 7 - 19
synopsis: Kai Winn gets unknowingly involved with Gul Dukat, surgically altered to resemble a Bajoran, using the name 'Anjohl.' Tensions further escalate between Weyoun and Legate Damar, as the Dominion gather to sign a peace treaty with the Breen, which includes granting the Breen certain Cardassian territories. Having been held captive by the Dominion, Ezri and Worf try to escape from the Cardassian home world.

show_sea_ep: Star Trek: Deep Space Nine - Season 7 - 20
synopsis: After the Breen attack Earth, mixed emotions abound on DS9. Kai Winn reveals her true feelings regarding the Prophets to her spiritual guide, a Bajoran farmer named Anjohl, who is a surgically altered Dukat, and turns her back on them, and convinced by him to embrace the Pah Wraiths. On the home world of Cardassia, Legate Damar mounts a resistance to the Dominion.

show_sea_ep: Star Trek: Deep Space Nine - Season 7 - 21
synopsis: Kira gets sent behind Cardassian lines in an effort to train them in resistance fighting. When Dr. Bashir learns of the deadly disease Odo is infected with, he gets met with resistamce whilst trying to obtain his medical records from Starfleet. Martok gets blindsided by Gowron when he arrives on DS9, announcing he has assumed command of the Klingon fleet.

show_sea_ep: Star Trek: Deep Space Nine - Season 7 - 22
synopsis: Odo is affected by the disease threatening to eliminate his race more than he lets on, while Kira has to deal with the Cardassians' dislike of her. Even though General Martok sees Chancellor Gowron's move as part of a political vendetta, he does nothing about it. Worf suspects Gowron's military strategies are meant to humiliate Martok's command abilities, without thought the consequences have for Klingons as a whole. Meanwhile, O'Brien suggests to Bashir he announce he's found a cure to the Changelings' disease to lure someone from Section 31 to DS9.

show_sea_ep: Star Trek: Deep Space Nine - Season 7 - 23
synopsis: Dr. Bashir and Chief O'Brien go to some pretty extreme measures to try and track down a cure for Odo.

show_sea_ep: Star Trek: Deep Space Nine - Season 7 - 24
synopsis: Odo begins recovery from the deadly disease which Dr. Bashir tells him had been engineered by Section 31 in order to wipe out the Founders' entire race, A resistance mission goes bad for Kira and Garak, and they end up hiding in the basement of the house which Garak grew up in. They soon hear Legate Damar - who had been on their mission and was hiding with them - has just become a casualty of war. The Grand Nagus has chosen Quark to become his successor, upon his impending retirement on the pleasure planet, Risa.

show_sea_ep: Star Trek: Deep Space Nine - Season 7 - 25
synopsis: As the Dominion War comes to an end, Dukat goes to the Pah Wraiths to awaken them. Meanwhile the Dominion turn on the rebelling Cardassians, destroying them city by city. Will the Alliance prevail over the Dominion? Will Garak and the Rebellion stop them before the destruction of Cardassia? Will Sisko stop the Pah Wraiths from rising?

show_sea_ep: Star Trek: Deep Space Nine - Season 1 - 1
synopsis: When the troubled Commander Sisko takes command of a surrendered space station, he learns that it borders a unique stable wormhole.

show_sea_ep: Star Trek: Deep Space Nine - Season 1 - 2
synopsis: Tahna Los, a former Bajoran terrorist during the Occupation, asks Sisko for asylum on DS9. Meanwhile, the station's last Cardassian inhabitant, Garak, possibly a former spy for the Cardassian government, proves an interesting mystery to Dr. Bashir.

show_sea_ep: Star Trek: Deep Space Nine - Season 1 - 3
synopsis: Ibudan, a criminal Odo has dealt with before, returns to DS9 only to be murdered shortly after - leaving Odo to be the prime suspect. Jake and Nog's trouble making prompt Keiko to do something helpful for the station's children.

show_sea_ep: Star Trek: Deep Space Nine - Season 1 - 4
synopsis: The crew and civilian population of Deep Space Nine begin to speak gibberish when a plague - an 'aphasia virus' - engineered by the Bajorans as a weapon against the Cardassians, accidentally gets released into the station's atmosphere.

show_sea_ep: Star Trek: Deep Space Nine - Season 1 - 5
synopsis: For the first time an alien comes from the other side of the wormhole. He has ship trouble and seems very reluctant to accept any help. Chief O'Brien quickly finds out he has a secret.

show_sea_ep: Star Trek: Deep Space Nine - Season 1 - 6
synopsis: Q, the Enterprise-D's consistent omnipotent annoyance, comes to harass the DS9 crew when his traveling companion, Vash, refuses to travel with Q any longer.

show_sea_ep: Star Trek: Deep Space Nine - Season 1 - 7
synopsis: Jadzia Dax is accused of a murder that her previous host, Curzon, supposedly committed.

show_sea_ep: Star Trek: Deep Space Nine - Season 1 - 8
synopsis: Rao Vantika, a captured criminal, is badly burned and dies in Bashir's arms but the criminal's captor believes that he is still alive.

show_sea_ep: Star Trek: Deep Space Nine - Season 1 - 9
synopsis: The Wadi from the Gamma Quadrant visit DS9, thereby making first contact with the Federation. When they catch Quark cheating, they let him off by playing a special game.

show_sea_ep: Star Trek: Deep Space Nine - Season 1 - 10
synopsis: The Ferengi leader, Grand Nagus Zek, comes to the station. He seems very interested in Quark's bar.

show_sea_ep: Star Trek: Deep Space Nine - Season 1 - 11
synopsis: A man named Croden tells Odo he can take him to a place where aliens much like Odo himself exist, which would help Odo find out where he truly comes from.

show_sea_ep: Star Trek: Deep Space Nine - Season 1 - 12
synopsis: After showing Bajoran spiritual leader Kai Opaka the wormhole, she, Sisko, Bashir and Kira crash land on a moon. Kai Opaka dies and the three meet the unfriendly locals.

show_sea_ep: Star Trek: Deep Space Nine - Season 1 - 13
synopsis: While Sisko tries to negotiate an agreement between two Bajoran factions, he orders O'Brien to escort Bashir to investigate an emergency that endangers a village.

show_sea_ep: Star Trek: Deep Space Nine - Season 1 - 14
synopsis: Kira must convince an old Bajoran farmer to leave a moon becoming uninhabitable due to mining operations. Jake and Nog try to trade off Cardassian yamok sauce.

show_sea_ep: Star Trek: Deep Space Nine - Season 1 - 15
synopsis: While Dax investigates an unusual energy reading near DS9 to see if it's dangerous for the station, people's imaginations suddenly come alive, causing chaos.

show_sea_ep: Star Trek: Deep Space Nine - Season 1 - 16
synopsis: Lwaxana Troi comes for a political visit and instead hounds Odo for romantic attention. Meanwhile, an alien probe wreaks havoc with the station's computer, leaving Odo and Lwaxana trapped together.

show_sea_ep: Star Trek: Deep Space Nine - Season 1 - 17
synopsis: The entire station's command staff, save Odo, become power hungry and vie to defeat each other by forming secret alliances and plotting assassinations. Odo tries to figure out the cause of this mysterious behavior.

show_sea_ep: Star Trek: Deep Space Nine - Season 1 - 18
synopsis: A Cardassian suffering from Kalla-Nohra, a disease that indicates he served in a labor camp, visits DS9. Kira is determined to convict him as a war criminal.

show_sea_ep: Star Trek: Deep Space Nine - Season 1 - 19
ep_title: In the Hands of the Prophets
synopsis: Vedek Winn, a candidate in the race for the open Kai position, stirs up trouble on DS9 when she attempts to boycott Keiko's school for not teaching Bajoran religious beliefs.

show_sea_ep: Star Trek: Deep Space Nine - Season 2 - 1
synopsis: Word that a previously thought dead Bajoran resistance legend is still alive sends Kira and Chief O'Brien to Cardassia IV to rescue him; meanwhile "The Circle", a sect of the Bajoran provisional government that is intent on wiping out alien influence, is sneaking into power.

show_sea_ep: Star Trek: Deep Space Nine - Season 2 - 2
synopsis: Kira spends time with Vedek Bareil on Bajor just as "The Circle" begins arming themselves from a mysterious source.

show_sea_ep: Star Trek: Deep Space Nine - Season 2 - 3
synopsis: As a Circle-led Bajoran military attempts to occupy the station, a skeleton crew, led by Sisko fight to reveal the Circle's secret before they're forced to evacuate themselves. Meanwhile, Kira and Dax lead a mission to reveal the truth about the Circle, on Bajor.

show_sea_ep: Star Trek: Deep Space Nine - Season 2 - 4
synopsis: A jealous Trill, who had waited his entire life to receive a symbiont but never did, decides to steal Dax's.

show_sea_ep: Star Trek: Deep Space Nine - Season 2 - 5
synopsis: Political tensions rise on DS9 when Bajorans board the station with a supposedly orphaned Cardassian whom they have adopted.

show_sea_ep: Star Trek: Deep Space Nine - Season 2 - 6
synopsis: Melora Pazlar, a new arrival on DS9 with a special gravity-based disability, finds an admirer in Bashir. Meanwhile, an old associate of Quark's comes to the station to kill the bartender.

show_sea_ep: Star Trek: Deep Space Nine - Season 2 - 7
synopsis: A female Ferengi named Pel, posing as a male so that she can engage in business, falls for Quark during very important negotiations between the Ferengi and a Gamma Quadrant race.

show_sea_ep: Star Trek: Deep Space Nine - Season 2 - 8
synopsis: Odo relives some terrible and tragic memories of a past investigation when he was the constable on Cardassian-occupied Deep Space Nine, then named Terok Nor.

show_sea_ep: Star Trek: Deep Space Nine - Season 2 - 9
synopsis: While noted scientist Gideon Seyetik is preparing for an ambitious project, re-igniting a star, Sisko is intrigued by a woman who keeps disappearing.

show_sea_ep: Star Trek: Deep Space Nine - Season 2 - 10
synopsis: A race that has been conquered twice over, one of the conquerors being the mysterious Dominion, comes to the station seeking aid and a new home.

show_sea_ep: Star Trek: Deep Space Nine - Season 2 - 11
synopsis: Quark meets his match when a new rival opens a casino opposite his bar on the Promenade. Meanwhile, the station is suffering issues of high improbability.

show_sea_ep: Star Trek: Deep Space Nine - Season 2 - 12
synopsis: Odo and his mentor Dr. Mora Pol discover a lifeform similar to Odo on a Gamma Quadrant planet.

show_sea_ep: Star Trek: Deep Space Nine - Season 2 - 13
synopsis: Chief O'Brien, who still doesn't particularly like Doctor Bashir, must rely on him when the two are stranded on a planet and O'Brien is infected with a deadly, fast moving disease.

show_sea_ep: Star Trek: Deep Space Nine - Season 2 - 14
synopsis: Chief O'Brien's world is turned upside down when for no reason whatsoever he is being ignored by his family and friends and is being closed out of every essential job on the station.

show_sea_ep: Star Trek: Deep Space Nine - Season 2 - 15
synopsis: Sisko and Chief O'Brien discover a colony which lives without technology.

show_sea_ep: Star Trek: Deep Space Nine - Season 2 - 16
synopsis: Odo and Dax investigate the mysterious disappearance of people from a village. Kira tries to keep a close eye on Quark, while Vedek Bareil unexpectedly visits.

show_sea_ep: Star Trek: Deep Space Nine - Season 2 - 17
synopsis: A Trill named Arjin comes to DS9 to learn what it is to be a Trill with a symbiont but finds his teacher, Dax, to be less than he expected.

show_sea_ep: Star Trek: Deep Space Nine - Season 2 - 18
synopsis: A Cardassian woman named Natima Lang, who was once a flame of Quark's, visits the station under dubious circumstances.

show_sea_ep: Star Trek: Deep Space Nine - Season 2 - 19
synopsis: Three legendary Klingons come to DS9 to see if Jadzia will participate in a blood oath that they made with Dax's previous host Curzon.

show_sea_ep: Star Trek: Deep Space Nine - Season 2 - 20
synopsis: The destruction of a Cardassian ship leads Sisko, Dukat, and Sisko's old friend Cal Hudson to the fact that there is an unofficial war between the Maquis and the Cardassians.

show_sea_ep: Star Trek: Deep Space Nine - Season 2 - 21
synopsis: Sisko tries to resolve the Maquis crisis by preventing a war, freeing Gul Dukat and offering the defected Hudson the chance to return.

show_sea_ep: Star Trek: Deep Space Nine - Season 2 - 22
synopsis: Dr. Bashir fights to save Garak's life when a device implanted in his brain, designed to alleviate pain in the event of torture, begins to malfunction and is slowly killing him.

show_sea_ep: Star Trek: Deep Space Nine - Season 2 - 23
synopsis: Kira and Bashir find themselves in an alternate universe.

show_sea_ep: Star Trek: Deep Space Nine - Season 2 - 24
synopsis: Vedek Bareil's targeted by fellow Kai candidate, Vedek Winn as having been a collaborator with the Cardassians during the Occupation.

show_sea_ep: Star Trek: Deep Space Nine - Season 2 - 25
synopsis: Chief O'Brien goes through the horrific Cardassian judicial system when he is charged for an unknown crime.

show_sea_ep: Star Trek: Deep Space Nine - Season 2 - 26
synopsis: While in the Gamma Quadrant, Sisko, Quark and a strange telepathic woman are captured by the Jem'Hadar, the soldiers of the Dominion.

show_sea_ep: Star Trek: Deep Space Nine - Season 3 - 1
synopsis: Instead of waiting for the Jem'Hadar to attack, Sisko wants to try a different tactic; he wants to take a new class starship to try to find the Founders.

show_sea_ep: Star Trek: Deep Space Nine - Season 3 - 2
synopsis: Odo has found his home and is introduced. Meanwhile Sisko finds out peace talks between the Dominion and the Federation have already started.

show_sea_ep: Star Trek: Deep Space Nine - Season 3 - 3
synopsis: Quark is forced to marry a Klingon widow after he takes credit for the accidental death of her husband, the head of a powerful Klingon House.

show_sea_ep: Star Trek: Deep Space Nine - Season 3 - 4
synopsis: The Trill homeworld is the setting, as Sisko and Bashir take Jadzia home for treatment when she begins experiencing hallucinations after playing a tune she can't recall.

show_sea_ep: Star Trek: Deep Space Nine - Season 3 - 5
synopsis: Kira finds herself on Cardassia as a Cardassian. She is told she is called Iliana Ghemor and was a Cardassian spy.

show_sea_ep: Star Trek: Deep Space Nine - Season 3 - 6
synopsis: Odo tries to change the nature of a rapidly maturing Jem'Hadar infant, Quark finds, whilst Sisko tries to break his son's relationship with a 20 year old Dabo girl.

show_sea_ep: Star Trek: Deep Space Nine - Season 3 - 7
synopsis: The station goes into lockdown and the crew is endangered when an old Cardassian security program is accidentally activated.

show_sea_ep: Star Trek: Deep Space Nine - Season 3 - 8
synopsis: Dax falls in love with one of the residents of a multi-dimensional planet, while on DS9 an alien requests a holosuite program of Kira from Quark.

show_sea_ep: Star Trek: Deep Space Nine - Season 3 - 9
synopsis: Riker arrives on the station to requisition the Defiant in order to fight with the Maquis. Sisko assists Gul Dukat on Cardassia Prime to prevent the ship from entering Cardassian territory.

show_sea_ep: Star Trek: Deep Space Nine - Season 3 - 10
synopsis: When Lwaxana Troi visits the station for the Bajoran Gratitude Festival, the crew is stricken with intense romantic attractions to one another.

show_sea_ep: Star Trek: Deep Space Nine - Season 3 - 11
synopsis: Sisko, Bashir and Dax are accidentally sent to San Francisco in the 21st century due to a transporter malfunction, and must figure out how to get back to return without changing the time line.

show_sea_ep: Star Trek: Deep Space Nine - Season 3 - 12
synopsis: Sisko is forced to take the place of a key historical figure on Earth in 2024 in order to preserve the timeline.

show_sea_ep: Star Trek: Deep Space Nine - Season 3 - 13
synopsis: Dr. Bashir must use extraordinary measures to prolong Vedek Bareil's life long enough to allow Bareil to complete sensitive peace negotiations between the Bajorans and the Cardassians.

show_sea_ep: Star Trek: Deep Space Nine - Season 3 - 14
synopsis: After chasing a fugitive into a cave, Kira gets stuck and is slowly encapsulated by a growing crystal stone while Odo tries to figure out how to free her.

show_sea_ep: Star Trek: Deep Space Nine - Season 3 - 15
synopsis: Sisko faces a conflict between his Starfleet duties and his role as the Bajoran Emissary when an ancient Bajoran prophecy predicts a joint Federation-Cardassian project will lead to the destruction of the wormhole.

show_sea_ep: Star Trek: Deep Space Nine - Season 3 - 16
synopsis: Grand Nagus Zek is acting bizarre by giving away money and rewriting the Rules of Acquisition. Quark attempts to get the old Nagus back.

show_sea_ep: Star Trek: Deep Space Nine - Season 3 - 17
synopsis: While a Romulan delegation tries to get information about the Dominion, O'Brien gets visions of unpleasant things that are about to happen in the future.

show_sea_ep: Star Trek: Deep Space Nine - Season 3 - 18
synopsis: After being attacked in the infirmary, Dr. Bashir has a dual mystery on his hands: what has happened to the station while he was out and why is he aging so rapidly now?

show_sea_ep: Star Trek: Deep Space Nine - Season 3 - 19
synopsis: Sisko is kidnapped and forced to impersonate his deceased mirror universe counterpart in order to convince Jennifer Sisko to defect to the Terran Rebellion.

show_sea_ep: Star Trek: Deep Space Nine - Season 3 - 20
synopsis: After an attempt is made on Garak's life, Odo conducts the investigation on who tried to murder the Cardassian tailor - and why.

show_sea_ep: Star Trek: Deep Space Nine - Season 3 - 21
synopsis: Now rejoined with his former mentor, Garak is ordered to interrogate Odo about the secrets of his people, while the joined Romulan/Cardassian attack fleet moves towards the Founders' home world on a mission of destruction.

show_sea_ep: Star Trek: Deep Space Nine - Season 3 - 22
synopsis: Sisko rebuilds an ancient Bajoran space vessel from the blueprints, and he and Jake take the ship on a trip, attempting to prove that the ancient Bajorans went beyond their solar system without warp drive.

show_sea_ep: Star Trek: Deep Space Nine - Season 3 - 23
synopsis: Quark and Rom return to the Ferengi home world because their mother has broken the law - by wearing clothes and earning profits, forbidden for women in Ferengi society.

show_sea_ep: Star Trek: Deep Space Nine - Season 3 - 24
synopsis: News arrives that Kai Winn has also become Bajor's political leader. She asks Kira to negotiate with an old resistance friend about returning soil reclamators.

show_sea_ep: Star Trek: Deep Space Nine - Season 3 - 25
synopsis: Dax asks the crew to join her Zhian'tara ritual. The memories of her former hosts will take over their bodies. Nog is preparing for Starfleet Academy.

show_sea_ep: Star Trek: Deep Space Nine - Season 3 - 26
synopsis: The Defiant is off to show the Federation's presence to the new Tzenkethi government. While underway the ship malfunctions and repeated instances leads Sisko to believe a changeling's onboard, engaging in sabotage.

show_sea_ep: Star Trek: Deep Space Nine - Season 4 - 1
synopsis: Sisko becomes uncomfortable when the Klingons station a task force to help defend against the Dominion. Worf is summoned to find out their true intentions.

show_sea_ep: Star Trek: Deep Space Nine - Season 4 - 2
synopsis: Melanie, an aspiring writer, wants to know why Jake Sisko stopped writing at 40. Jake tells how his father died in an accident and then suddenly reappeared.

show_sea_ep: Star Trek: Deep Space Nine - Season 4 - 3
synopsis: Bashir is asked to help a group of renegade Jem'Hadar break their addiction to ketracel white. Meanwhile Worf is dissatisfied with the way Odo runs security.

show_sea_ep: Star Trek: Deep Space Nine - Season 4 - 4
synopsis: Kira and Gul Dukat go after the lost prison ship Ravinok. Dukat has a secret. Meanwhile Kasidy Yates tries to find work near Bajor, leaving Sisko uncomfortable.

show_sea_ep: Star Trek: Deep Space Nine - Season 4 - 5
synopsis: Lenara Kahn, the new host of the wife of Dax's former host Torias, comes to the station. While they're not allowed to renew their relation, there's still a spark.

show_sea_ep: Star Trek: Deep Space Nine - Season 4 - 6
synopsis: A damaged Defiant must play a dangerous game of cat-and-mouse with two Jem'hadar ships inside a gas giant.

show_sea_ep: Star Trek: Deep Space Nine - Season 4 - 7
synopsis: Quark and Rom take Nog to Earth and Starfleet Academy, but a malfunction with the ship takes the crew back in time, to Roswell, New Mexico in 1947.

show_sea_ep: Star Trek: Deep Space Nine - Season 4 - 8
synopsis: Worf, Dax and the Klingon Dahar master Kor set out to find an ancient lost relic: the Sword of Kahless.

show_sea_ep: Star Trek: Deep Space Nine - Season 4 - 9
synopsis: When a transporter emergency turns the command crew into holosuite characters, Bashir's James Bond fantasy takes on a deadly reality.

show_sea_ep: Star Trek: Deep Space Nine - Season 4 - 10
synopsis: Sisko travels to Earth when a bombing at a Federation conference is determined to be the work of Changelings.

show_sea_ep: Star Trek: Deep Space Nine - Season 4 - 11
synopsis: When Starfleet institutes martial law to combat the Changeling Menace, Sisko begins to question if the Dominion is the real threat.

show_sea_ep: Star Trek: Deep Space Nine - Season 4 - 12
synopsis: First Minister Shakaar visits the station, despite a threat of assassination. He falls in love with Kira much to Odo's dismay.

show_sea_ep: Star Trek: Deep Space Nine - Season 4 - 13
synopsis: Dukat returns, stripped of his prestige, to escort Kira to a Cardassian conference about the Dominion. But an attack by a Klingon raider may give Dukat a chance to redeem himself in the eyes of his government.

show_sea_ep: Star Trek: Deep Space Nine - Season 4 - 14
synopsis: Worf's brother Kurn asks him to perform a death rite to regain his lost honor. Meanwhile, Kira and O'Brien investigate Klingon activity near the Bajoran border.

show_sea_ep: Star Trek: Deep Space Nine - Season 4 - 15
synopsis: Unfair working conditions and pay cuts cause Rom to organize a union of the employees of Quark's Bar. Meanwhile, Worf still finds it hard to settle on the station.

show_sea_ep: Star Trek: Deep Space Nine - Season 4 - 16
synopsis: A man claiming to be the emissary comes through the wormhole. Sisko is happy to give up his position. Meanwhile Keiko returns and O'Brien stops spending time with Bashir.

show_sea_ep: Star Trek: Deep Space Nine - Season 4 - 17
synopsis: When Worf destroys a civilian shuttle during an engagement with the Klingons, an extradition hearing is held to see if he must face charges.

show_sea_ep: Star Trek: Deep Space Nine - Season 4 - 18
synopsis: O'Brien tries to re-integrate to life on the station after serving 20 years in a virtual prison.

show_sea_ep: Star Trek: Deep Space Nine - Season 4 - 19
synopsis: When the Mirror Universe counterpart of Sisko's deceased wife lures Jake to the other side, Sisko must follow and help the Terran resistance against the Alliance forces.

show_sea_ep: Star Trek: Deep Space Nine - Season 4 - 20
synopsis: A mysterious woman approaches Jake about his future as a writer. Odo promises to do whatever it takes to help Lwaxana Troi keep her baby over the father's wishes - even if it means marrying her himself.

show_sea_ep: Star Trek: Deep Space Nine - Season 4 - 21
synopsis: Sisko must face betrayal when evidence surfaces that Kasidy is smuggling for the Maquis. Meanwhile Garak makes acquaintance with Ziyal.

show_sea_ep: Star Trek: Deep Space Nine - Season 4 - 22
synopsis: A renegade group of Jem'Hadar plunders Deep Space Nine. Sisko agrees to a combat operation with loyal Jem'Hadar to prevent the renegades completing a planetary gateway.

show_sea_ep: Star Trek: Deep Space Nine - Season 4 - 23
synopsis: Bashir tries to help a planet in the grips of a Dominion-engineered plague that guarantees a painful death.

show_sea_ep: Star Trek: Deep Space Nine - Season 4 - 24
synopsis: Quarks hears on Ferenginar he is going to die. Rom convinces him to sell his remains. After an accident, Bashir has to move Keiko's baby to Kira's womb.

show_sea_ep: Star Trek: Deep Space Nine - Season 4 - 25
synopsis: Odo is suddenly struck by illness. He is barely able to hold shape. Bashir and Odo see no other alternative than going to the Founders. Garak wants to come along.

show_sea_ep: Star Trek: Deep Space Nine - Season 5 - 1
synopsis: With the war between Klingons and Federation intensifying, Sisko must make a plan to expose Gowron as a changeling. Odo is still having trouble with becoming a solid.

show_sea_ep: Star Trek: Deep Space Nine - Season 5 - 2
synopsis: The crew is forced to retreat in a crashed Jem'Hadar ship after an attack by the Jem'Hadar. They get the feeling there's something very important about this ship.

show_sea_ep: Star Trek: Deep Space Nine - Season 5 - 3
ep_title: Looking for par'Mach in All the Wrong Places
synopsis: While Worf helps Quark to pursue his former wife Grilka, O'Brien and Kira grow uncomfortably close to each other.

show_sea_ep: Star Trek: Deep Space Nine - Season 5 - 4
synopsis: Jake, reporting from the front lines, sees what war truly is.

show_sea_ep: Star Trek: Deep Space Nine - Season 5 - 5
synopsis: An alien entity has possessed Keiko's body and is holding it hostage until O'Brien completes an assignment for it.

show_sea_ep: Star Trek: Deep Space Nine - Season 5 - 6
synopsis: Sisko tells two men from Temporal Investigations how he and his crew went back in time to when Captain James Kirk of the first Starship Enterprise exposed a Klingon spy with the help of Tribbles.

show_sea_ep: Star Trek: Deep Space Nine - Season 5 - 7
ep_title: Let He Who Is Without Sin...
synopsis: While vacationing on Risa, Worf and Dax meet a group of fundamentalist protesters who claim that the Federation has gone soft.

show_sea_ep: Star Trek: Deep Space Nine - Season 5 - 8
synopsis: Sisko, Dax, Odo and Garak find themselves in the past when the Cardassians controlled the station, and a crime that Odo investigated may be the key.

show_sea_ep: Star Trek: Deep Space Nine - Season 5 - 9
synopsis: When Odo and Quark crash land, they must put aside their differences to climb a mountain to signal for help. Jake and Nog try to be roommates, but their different styles clash.

show_sea_ep: Star Trek: Deep Space Nine - Season 5 - 10
synopsis: Sisko begins having visions that may show him how to best help Bajor, but they're killing him.

show_sea_ep: Star Trek: Deep Space Nine - Season 5 - 11
synopsis: A mysterious assassin begins wiping out all the members of Kira's old resistance cell.

show_sea_ep: Star Trek: Deep Space Nine - Season 5 - 12
synopsis: The discovery of an infant Changeling gives Odo a chance to correct what he sees as the "mistakes" in his upbringing. But as Starfleet's pressure for results grows, he has to turn to his "father," Dr. Mora

show_sea_ep: Star Trek: Deep Space Nine - Season 5 - 13
synopsis: When the traitorous Eddington returns, Sisko will go to any lengths to capture him.

show_sea_ep: Star Trek: Deep Space Nine - Season 5 - 14
synopsis: A coded message from the Gamma Quadrant leads Garak to believe his mentor, Enabran Tain, is still alive. He and Worf seek him out, only to discover something much worse: a Dominion invasion fleet poised to attack the Alpha Quadrant.

show_sea_ep: Star Trek: Deep Space Nine - Season 5 - 15
synopsis: The station readies for a Dominion attack. Worf and Garak meet some unexpected friends in a Dominion Prison camp.

show_sea_ep: Star Trek: Deep Space Nine - Season 5 - 16
synopsis: Dr. Bashir is selected to be the model for the next-generation of Emergency Medical Hologram (EMH). But he balks when his parents are invited to the station to be interviewed by the EMH programmer, Dr. Zimmerman. There is a dark secret in his family that he's afraid that his parents will reveal.

show_sea_ep: Star Trek: Deep Space Nine - Season 5 - 17
synopsis: Odo (Rene Auberjonois) becomes romantically attached to a woman (Dey Young) working with the Orion Syndicate.

show_sea_ep: Star Trek: Deep Space Nine - Season 5 - 18
synopsis: Quark must wrestle with his conscience when he becomes involved with arms merchants.

show_sea_ep: Star Trek: Deep Space Nine - Season 5 - 19
synopsis: When a Cardassian official (Lawrence Pressman), who thinks of Kira (Nana Visitor) as his daughter, is dying, he agrees to reveal all he knows to her. But the experience dredges up Kira's memories of her own father's (Thomas Kopache) death.

show_sea_ep: Star Trek: Deep Space Nine - Season 5 - 20
synopsis: Quark doesn't know whether to be panicked or overjoyed when he learns that his mother is the new lover of the Grand Nagus.

show_sea_ep: Star Trek: Deep Space Nine - Season 5 - 21
synopsis: Dax and Worf accompany Martok on his first command since being held by the Dominion. But the ship they are given hasn't seen victory in months and the crew is near mutinous.

show_sea_ep: Star Trek: Deep Space Nine - Season 5 - 22
synopsis: The DS9 crew discovers a small colony on a remote world that was originally populated by them 200 years earlier due to a time-travel accident with the Defiant. The current colonists lives depend on making sure that accident happens again, even though they've now forwarned the crew that it will happen. Each crew member needs to decide if they are willing to give up their lives on DS9 in order to preserve the history of the colony.

show_sea_ep: Star Trek: Deep Space Nine - Season 5 - 23
synopsis: Driven to desperation by the Dominion, the Maquis launch a massive bio-weapons strike towards Cardassia. Sisko must trust the traitor Eddington to try to stop them.

show_sea_ep: Star Trek: Deep Space Nine - Season 5 - 24
synopsis: While salvaging components from DS9's sister station, the crew run afoul of a "surprise" left behind by the Cardassians.

show_sea_ep: Star Trek: Deep Space Nine - Season 5 - 25
synopsis: Jake and Nog go through hell and high water, from participating in an auction to dealing with the Dominion, to receiving a Willie Mays baseball card, all in order to cheer up the war-fatigued Captain Sisko.

show_sea_ep: Star Trek: Deep Space Nine - Season 5 - 26
synopsis: With the continuing battalions of Jem'Hadar entering the Alpha Quadrant in preparation for war, Sisko decides to mine the wormhole to prevent further troop movement. This provokes a confrontation between the Dominion and the Federation, forcing Sisko to abandon DS9.

show_sea_ep: Star Trek: Deep Space Nine - Season 6 - 1
synopsis: Borrowing a captured Jem'Hadar attack ship, Sisko and crew embark on a mission to destroy the hidden base where all of the ketracel-white is stored for the entire Alpha Quadrant.

show_sea_ep: Star Trek: Deep Space Nine - Season 6 - 2
synopsis: Sisko and his crew crash on a barren world when their commandeered Jem'Hadar ship is shot down. They encounter Jem'Hadar who crashed there earlier, and have taken Nog and Garak hostage in exchange for medical aid for their Vorta overseer.

show_sea_ep: Star Trek: Deep Space Nine - Season 6 - 3
synopsis: Serving with his recruit son aboard a Klingon vessel, Worf finds his relationship with his son strained. Meanwhile, strained relationships abound on DS9 between Major Kira and Gul Dukat.

show_sea_ep: Star Trek: Deep Space Nine - Season 6 - 4
synopsis: After forming an attack plan on the Dominion, Sisko relinquishes command of the Defiant to Dax after accepting a promotion. On DS9, the resistance faces discovery when Odo links with another changeling.

show_sea_ep: Star Trek: Deep Space Nine - Season 6 - 5
synopsis: Sisko mounts an attack to re-take DS9, while Rom faces charges as an enemy of the Dominion state.

show_sea_ep: Star Trek: Deep Space Nine - Season 6 - 6
synopsis: The Federation attacks DS9 in hopes of keeping the mine field at the wormhole intact, while the Dominion waits entrance to the Alpha Quadrant from the other side.

show_sea_ep: Star Trek: Deep Space Nine - Season 6 - 7
synopsis: Suddenly desiring to wed within the week on DS9, Worf and Jadzia go through their own Klingon rituals: Worf on a four day bachelor party with the male members of the crew & Jadzia deals with her prospective mother-in-law, who totally opposes the idea of "an alien" marrying into her Klingon household.

show_sea_ep: Star Trek: Deep Space Nine - Season 6 - 8
synopsis: Major Kira takes a romantic interest in the mirror universe counterpart of her deceased lover Bareil after he transports himself into her universe and onto DS9.

show_sea_ep: Star Trek: Deep Space Nine - Season 6 - 9
synopsis: A group of genetically engineered humans are brought to Dr. Bashir on DS9 in hopes of integrating them with the rest of the universe.

show_sea_ep: Star Trek: Deep Space Nine - Season 6 - 10
synopsis: At the request of the Grand Nagus, Quark puts together a mission to rescue Quark's mother, who is in the hands of the Dominion.

show_sea_ep: Star Trek: Deep Space Nine - Season 6 - 11
synopsis: After being attacked by Cardassian forces, Sisko gets stranded with a very psychotic Gul Dukat, who was being transported to his trial. Meanwhile the crew of the Defiant races to rescue survivors.

show_sea_ep: Star Trek: Deep Space Nine - Season 6 - 12
synopsis: A former patron of Quark's bequeaths everything to him.

show_sea_ep: Star Trek: Deep Space Nine - Season 6 - 13
synopsis: Captain Sisko has a full sensory vision of himself as an under-appreciated science fiction magazine writer in 1950s America.

show_sea_ep: Star Trek: Deep Space Nine - Season 6 - 14
synopsis: A Dominion attack on the Defiant endangers Dax, Bashir and O'Brien aboard the runabout U.S.S. Rubicon as they enter an anomaly that shrinks them to a very minute size. Unfortunately, they were being held stable by the Defiant within a tractor beam, which was discontinued during the attack.

show_sea_ep: Star Trek: Deep Space Nine - Season 6 - 15
synopsis: Chief O'Brien goes undercover to infiltrate an Orion crime ring.

show_sea_ep: Star Trek: Deep Space Nine - Season 6 - 16
synopsis: Worf and Jadzia travel to the badlands to procure some information on the Dominion from a traitorous Cardassian. Bashir wants to engage in a holo-suite spy simulation, but O'Brien prefers to brush up on his tongo game after watching Jadzia lose to Quark.

show_sea_ep: Star Trek: Deep Space Nine - Season 6 - 17
ep_title: Wrongs Darker Than Death or Night
synopsis: After receiving some disturbing information from Gul Dukat, Major Kira seeks Sisko's approval as Emissary to travel back in time to find out the truth about her mother.

show_sea_ep: Star Trek: Deep Space Nine - Season 6 - 18
synopsis: Dr. Bashir's plans to attend a medical conference at a breezy resort are canceled when Starfleet Intelligence boards DS9, suspecting the doctor of treason.

show_sea_ep: Star Trek: Deep Space Nine - Season 6 - 19
synopsis: To save the Federation in a critical scheme, Sisko comes to realize that he must violate its fundamental principles to do so.

show_sea_ep: Star Trek: Deep Space Nine - Season 6 - 20
synopsis: Odo is schooled in the ways of romance by a holographic programmed lounge singer.

show_sea_ep: Star Trek: Deep Space Nine - Season 6 - 21
synopsis: Spiritualists on Bajor summon Captain Sisko to the planet surface, where they show him a stone tablet with some unknown inscriptions. Once on DS9, the inscription reveals an ancient prophecy of coming disasters surrounding the wormhole, Bajor, and DS9, as those around him voice their uneasiness about Sisko being an Emissary for the planet.

show_sea_ep: Star Trek: Deep Space Nine - Season 6 - 22
synopsis: Jake and Nog's runabout come under attack from the Jem'Hadar, and are rescued by the Valiant, a ship manned by Red Squad, an elite group of young Starfleet cadets.

show_sea_ep: Star Trek: Deep Space Nine - Season 6 - 23
synopsis: Quark's mother and the Grand Nagus show up on DS9, announcing a new amendment to the Bill of Opportunities he has instituted on the home planet of Ferenganar, and then follows up with the announcement, that, due to the new amendment, chaos has followed and he has been deposed.

show_sea_ep: Star Trek: Deep Space Nine - Season 6 - 24
synopsis: The Chief's daughter gets caught in a time displacement and when they get her back, she is considerably older.

show_sea_ep: Star Trek: Deep Space Nine - Season 6 - 25
synopsis: As the Defiant races to a shipwrecked officer who is days away, the crew keeps in contact with her. Meanwhile, Jake follows Quark's latest scheme for story research.

show_sea_ep: Star Trek: Deep Space Nine - Season 6 - 26
synopsis: When Sisko is picked to head up an attack on the Cardassian homeworld, the Prophets appear to him in a vision, warning him of impending doom if he leaves the station.

show_sea_ep: Star Trek: Deep Space Nine - Season 7 - 1
synopsis: Having returned to Earth a couple of months ago, Sisko waits for the Prophets to instruct him on what to do next. When he receives one, he begins searching for the woman behind the face in the sand in his vision. Meanwhile, back on DS9, Kira deals with a promotion and handling the decisions surrounding her command, and finding herself wishing for the return of Sisko. And Worf deals with the loss of his wife, Jadzia Dax.

show_sea_ep: Star Trek: Deep Space Nine - Season 7 - 2
synopsis: Ezri Dax joins Sisko and his family on his quest for the Orb of the Emissary. Colonel Kira mounts a blockade around a Bajoran moon, where the Romulan hospital is - along with thousands of Romulan missles (claimed to be defensive in purpose). Quark joins Bashir & O'Brien as they join Worf, aboard a Klingon warship as they mount a dangerous mission in Jadzia Dax's name in an effort to get her spirit into Sto-vo-kor, the Klingon's heaven.

show_sea_ep: Star Trek: Deep Space Nine - Season 7 - 3
synopsis: Sisko tries to convince Ezri to stay in Starfleet and serve aboard DS9, as Ezri tries to get to know Jadzia's friends aboard the station, especially Worf. Meanwhile, Garak tries to deal with a severe bout of claustrophobia.

show_sea_ep: Star Trek: Deep Space Nine - Season 7 - 4
ep_title: Take Me Out to the Holosuite
synopsis: A Vulcan captain challenges Sisko to a game of baseball.

show_sea_ep: Star Trek: Deep Space Nine - Season 7 - 5
synopsis: Dr. Bashir attempts to bring one of his genetically engineered friends out of the catatonic state she is in, and when he is successful, he begins to fall for her.

show_sea_ep: Star Trek: Deep Space Nine - Season 7 - 6
ep_title: Treachery, Faith and the Great River
synopsis: A Vorta offers Odo valuable information on the Dominion in exchange for asylum. Meanwhile, Nog tries his Ferengi knowledge as he wheels and deals for a valuable piece of equipment for Chief O'Brien.

show_sea_ep: Star Trek: Deep Space Nine - Season 7 - 7
synopsis: An aged Kor requests an opportunity to die with honor as a warrior.

show_sea_ep: Star Trek: Deep Space Nine - Season 7 - 8
synopsis: Capt. Sisko and his away team volunteer to stay with a besieged unit at an isolated outpost.

show_sea_ep: Star Trek: Deep Space Nine - Season 7 - 9
synopsis: Kira is kidnapped and taken to Empok Nor by a member of a Pah'Wraith cult and discovers the group leader is Gul Dukat.

show_sea_ep: Star Trek: Deep Space Nine - Season 7 - 10
synopsis: Severely depressed at his serious war wound, Nog retreats into Vic Fontaine's holosuite program while the singer tries to help him.

show_sea_ep: Star Trek: Deep Space Nine - Season 7 - 11
synopsis: Ezri travels to her family home in search of Chief O'Brien who has discovered a murdered woman connected with the family and the Orion Syndicate.

show_sea_ep: Star Trek: Deep Space Nine - Season 7 - 12
synopsis: Quark and Rom have to rescue Grand Nagus Zek who's being held captive in the alternate universe.

show_sea_ep: Star Trek: Deep Space Nine - Season 7 - 13
synopsis: To find an apparently untraceable murderer, Ezri Dax reluctantly calls up the residual consciousness remnant of her symbiont's past hidden psychopathic murderer host, Joran.

show_sea_ep: Star Trek: Deep Space Nine - Season 7 - 14
synopsis: After searching out and finding Odo, another changeling asks him to leave DS9 with him, even though the rest of the crew aren't convinced the new changeling is not part of the Founders.

show_sea_ep: Star Trek: Deep Space Nine - Season 7 - 15
synopsis: When a programming glitch won't go away, mobsters take over Vic's and open for business, but the DS9 gang takes it personal when their favorite hangout is no longer their favorite, and they plan to get the new management ousted.

show_sea_ep: Star Trek: Deep Space Nine - Season 7 - 16
synopsis: While making plans to attend a medical conference on the Romulan home world, Dr. Bashir is contacted by Sloane of Section 31 and recruited to determine the health of a high-ranking Romulan official. Things turn more desperate, though, when the ranking Starfleet admiral traveling with him, who knows about Section 31's interest in the conference mysteriously suffers a brain aneurysm after Dr. Bashir finds out that Sloane is traveling with the group, as well.

show_sea_ep: Star Trek: Deep Space Nine - Season 7 - 17
synopsis: When the ship Worf was serving on is attacked in battle and all search efforts are abandoned, Ezri takes a runabout in search of him against Sisko's orders. Meanwhile, Sisko proposes to Kassidy Yates.

show_sea_ep: Star Trek: Deep Space Nine - Season 7 - 18
synopsis: The Prophets have told Sisko they do not approve of his impending marriage. Having been captured by the Breen, Ezri and Worf still don't know why the Breen would even bother to capture them. Some Cardassians are beginning to think their alliance with the Dominion was a grave mistake. Gul Dukat, disguised as a Bajoran, sets foot on DS9, and continues to unfurl his plan.

show_sea_ep: Star Trek: Deep Space Nine - Season 7 - 19
synopsis: Kai Winn gets unknowingly involved with Gul Dukat, surgically altered to resemble a Bajoran, using the name 'Anjohl.' Tensions further escalate between Weyoun and Legate Damar, as the Dominion gather to sign a peace treaty with the Breen, which includes granting the Breen certain Cardassian territories. Having been held captive by the Dominion, Ezri and Worf try to escape from the Cardassian home world.

show_sea_ep: Star Trek: Deep Space Nine - Season 7 - 20
synopsis: After the Breen attack Earth, mixed emotions abound on DS9. Kai Winn reveals her true feelings regarding the Prophets to her spiritual guide, a Bajoran farmer named Anjohl, who is a surgically altered Dukat, and turns her back on them, and convinced by him to embrace the Pah Wraiths. On the home world of Cardassia, Legate Damar mounts a resistance to the Dominion.

show_sea_ep: Star Trek: Deep Space Nine - Season 7 - 21
synopsis: Kira gets sent behind Cardassian lines in an effort to train them in resistance fighting. When Dr. Bashir learns of the deadly disease Odo is infected with, he gets met with resistamce whilst trying to obtain his medical records from Starfleet. Martok gets blindsided by Gowron when he arrives on DS9, announcing he has assumed command of the Klingon fleet.

show_sea_ep: Star Trek: Deep Space Nine - Season 7 - 22
synopsis: Odo is affected by the disease threatening to eliminate his race more than he lets on, while Kira has to deal with the Cardassians' dislike of her. Even though General Martok sees Chancellor Gowron's move as part of a political vendetta, he does nothing about it. Worf suspects Gowron's military strategies are meant to humiliate Martok's command abilities, without thought the consequences have for Klingons as a whole. Meanwhile, O'Brien suggests to Bashir he announce he's found a cure to the Changelings' disease to lure someone from Section 31 to DS9.

show_sea_ep: Star Trek: Deep Space Nine - Season 7 - 23
synopsis: Dr. Bashir and Chief O'Brien go to some pretty extreme measures to try and track down a cure for Odo.

show_sea_ep: Star Trek: Deep Space Nine - Season 7 - 24
synopsis: Odo begins recovery from the deadly disease which Dr. Bashir tells him had been engineered by Section 31 in order to wipe out the Founders' entire race, A resistance mission goes bad for Kira and Garak, and they end up hiding in the basement of the house which Garak grew up in. They soon hear Legate Damar - who had been on their mission and was hiding with them - has just become a casualty of war. The Grand Nagus has chosen Quark to become his successor, upon his impending retirement on the pleasure planet, Risa.

show_sea_ep: Star Trek: Deep Space Nine - Season 7 - 25
synopsis: As the Dominion War comes to an end, Dukat goes to the Pah Wraiths to awaken them. Meanwhile the Dominion turn on the rebelling Cardassians, destroying them city by city. Will the Alliance prevail over the Dominion? Will Garak and the Rebellion stop them before the destruction of Cardassia? Will Sisko stop the Pah Wraiths from rising?
